description: Provides a list of groups that are mapped to users.

parameters.name: applicationId
parameters.description: The identifier of the application for getting a list of groups mapped to users.

parameters.name: indexId
parameters.description: The identifier of the index for getting a list of groups mapped to users.

parameters.name: updatedEarlierThan
parameters.description: The timestamp identifier used for the latest PUT or DELETE action for mapping users to their groups.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: If the response is truncated, Amazon Q Business returns this token that you can use in the subsequent request to retrieve the next set of groups that are mapped to users.

nested_items.name: items
nested_items.description: Summary information for list of groups that are mapped to users.

nested_items.name: groupName
nested_items.description: The name of the group the summary information is for.
